article_title: Christie budget calls for $4.6M funding cut for Burlington County hospitals
article_text:
We're always interested in hearing about news in our community. Let us know what's going on!

Go to form

article_metadata.news_keywords: , state budget, chris christie, hospital funding, new jersey hospitals, medicaid, affordable care act, virtua memorial, virtua marlton, loudes medical center of burlington county, deborah heart and lung center
article_metadata.author: David Levinsky, staff writer

og.description: Burlington County's hospitals will lose millions in funding under Gov. Christie's proposed budget for the upcoming 2017 fiscal year.
